Once upon a time there was a lovely 

 princess. But she had an enchantment 

                     upon her of a fearful sort which could 

                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 

                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 

                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 

                         Many brave knights had attempted to 

                         free her from this dreadful prison, 

                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 

                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 

                         the tallest tower for her true love 

                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 

                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 

                         a load of - (toilet flush)

 

               Allstar - by Smashmouth begins to play. Shrek goes about his 

               day. While in a nearby town, the villagers get together to go 

               after the ogre.

attributes.review: trump is seriously a terrible person, and what’s even worst is how careless this man is and how many people come to his defense with excuses. it boggles my mind how he wants to take down an app for teens just because he feels like it’ll “get back at China.” as he continues to spew fatuous comments from his mouth, there should not be a such a platform for someone like him — someone who lacks common sense, decision making skills, and intuition on how to conduct oneself as a leader. which is why this app needs to be taken down ASAP. let him screw around on twitter instead. gen z will NOT go on without a fight.

attributes.review: This app is the WORST! I wanted to educate my two snails, Goose and Moose, about the greatest dictator in modern history, but the app doesn’t have any actually useful information! Plus, it crashes every other time I open it. The first time this app started up, it jump-scared me with a picture of a nasty wrinkly orange goblin and caused the soul to be ripped from my physical form. I am now a spirit floating aimlessly in limbo, leaving Goose and Moose to fend for themselves. How will my snails ever survive on their own without at least the knowledge of how to make it with just a small loan of a million dollars? Very sad. Momentum!
attributes.title: Stole my life force!

attributes.review: This app is so terrible it only spoke in toddler language (the language of trump the Cheeto himself) I couldn’t understand any of the “sentences” that he was trying to make with his very small brain. The app didn’t allow full access until I became racist and orange. Immediately once I pressed the get button my dog started biting my phone for fear that I would become part of the trump community. Luckily during the time that I had the app no brown men attacked me. I deleted it and I am now back to me old self BLACK LIVES MATTER✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿TRUMP IS A RAPIST AND IS PART OF THE SEX TRAFFICKING COMMUNITY.🖕🏼

attributes.title: THIS APP IS RACIST

attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal: BEEP. A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound: DING. Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Omg I have never experienced such a horrible app. I mean first why did it take so long to download this is a new phone and my WiFi is top notch. Second why is the app so glitchy I get on and it just freezes let me remind you this is a new phone so I don’t know what the problem is. I’m extremely disappointed with the quality. Don’t even try to repair this app it’s trash just take it off the App Store. I have never in my 68 years of living experience such poor quality and service delete this app or I will need to be speaking to a manager 😤🤬

My goodness! You’d think that our admirable president could do so much good for our country but can’t run a single app!Gosh I wish my husband was as good on computers but he’s not!! Even he could do a better job!There is so much wrong with this app where can I start? 1. So many bugs!!! I tried to contact the manager but they ignored me!!What terrible customer service😡!I will no longer be attending this app but I will be attending a Facebook group for antivaxmoms 😉if anyone wants to join it would be wonderful .🥰Remember children a good mom is a Karen because she KARS about you!!!🤪🤪😂😂🤣🤣🙈🙈
